title: One Ring
intro: The fate of Middle-earth hangs in the balance. The One Ring, source of Sauron's power, must be destroyed. You, a brave adventurer, have chosen to answer the call. Where will your journey begin? Choose wisely, for each path holds its own challenges and rewards.

nodes.name: Prancing Pony
nodes.banner: Barliman Butterbur, the innkeeper ask you:
nodes.question: Welcome, weary traveler! Rumors abound these days. What path stirs your heart?

answers.answer: I seek the wisdom of Elrond.
A visit to the Hobbits is long overdue.
The Dark Lord's domain beckons the brave!
answers.message: Barliman raises an eyebrow. 'Mordor? Even the bravest wouldn't venture there unprepared. A drink perhaps? To clear your head and choose a safer path

nodes.name: Rivendell
nodes.banner: Elrond, the Elf Lord glad to see you:
nodes.question: A familiar face graces Rivendell once more. What brings you to our Elven haven?

answers.answer: The Hobbits must be warned of the growing darkness.
I bear news for the Fellowship of the Ring.
Moria - The quickest route to Mordor lies through the mines.
answers.message: Elrond's face hardens. 'Moria is a perilous path, even for the most seasoned traveler. The Fellowship needs a more secure route. Tell me, what news do you bring?'

nodes.name: The Shire
nodes.banner: Frodo Baggins, the hobbit meet you:
nodes.question: Well met, friend! What news do you bring from the outside world?

answers.answer: Bill the ponyherder might have news of Gandalf.
The One Ring must be destroyed!
Mordor! - We should destroy the ring as soon as possible!
answers.message: Frodo recoils in horror. 'Mordor! That foul land! We cannot face such evil alone. There must be another way.

nodes.name: Bree
nodes.question: Greetings traveler! What brings you to the prancing Pony in Bree?

answers.answer: The Hobbits hold the key to defeating Sauron.
Elrond's counsel is needed in these troubled times.
I seek Gandalf the Grey. Have you seen him?
The One Ring must be destroyed at all costs!
answers.message: Barliman looks at you with concern. 'Mordor?  A noble quest, but a perilous one.  Perhaps you should seek Gandalf's wisdom before venturing there.'

nodes.name: Gandalf's Last Stand
nodes.banner: Aragorn, son of Arathorn, invites you:
nodes.question: A stranger arrives at the site of Gandalf's battle. What brings you here?

answers.answer: Barliman at the Prancing Pony might have news.
We must find way through Moria to reach Mordor
answers.message: Aragorn shakes his head grimly. 'Moria is too dangerous now. We need a different plan. Tell me, why do you believe a fellowship is the answer?

answers.answer: I seek news of Gandalf the Grey.
The Fellowship needs to be formed to destroy the One Ring

nodes.name: Lothlorien
nodes.banner: Galadriel, the Lady of the Woods looks at you:
nodes.question: Tell me, traveler, what burdens your heart as you enter Lothlorien?

answers.answer: Aragorn might have news of the Fellowship
The quickest path to Mordor lies through the mines of Moria.
answers.message: Galadriel's gaze pierces you. 'Moria is a place of darkness. The Fellowship needs all its strength. What news do you bring of the One Ring?'

answers.answer: The One Ring threatens to consume Middle-earth.

nodes.name: Fangorn
nodes.banner: Treebeard, the oldest Ent rustles you:
nodes.question: Who are you, and why do you disturb the peace of Fangorn?

answers.answer: Galadriel offers her wisdom and support.
We need allies in the fight against Sauron.
Mordor - Sauron's forces amass for war!
answers.message: Treebeard’s voice booms. 'Mordor! A blight upon Middle-earth! What can mere mortals do against such darkness?' He raises a creaking arm. 'Seek aid elsewhere.

nodes.name: Rohan
nodes.banner: Old and tired King Théoden asks yo:
nodes.question: Welcome to Rohan, traveler. What news do you bring from the wider world?

answers.answer: Treebeard watches over the land.
We need to unite the free peoples of Middle-earth
A warm meal and a good night's rest are most welcome.
Mordor - Sauron prepares for war!
answers.message: Théoden slams his fist on the table. 'Mordor! We have enough troubles of our own with Saruman's treachery. The Fellowship must find another way.

nodes.name: Gondor
nodes.banner: Denethor, the Steward of Gondor looks at you:
nodes.question: Word of your journey precedes you. What brings the Fellowship to Gondor?

answers.answer: Galadriel's light guides our path
King Théoden pledges his support!
The fate of Middle-earth rests on destroying the Ring there.
answers.message: Denethor said: 'No, the ring should be mine!'

answers.answer: The One Ring must be destroyed before Sauron conquers all.
answers.message: Denethor's face darkens. 'Mordor is a suicide mission. Speak plainly. What purpose do you have in venturing into that forsaken land?'

nodes.name: Orthank
nodes.banner: Saruman captured you. You'll never leave his castle!

nodes.name: Mordor
nodes.banner: Sauron finds the Ring. The end of Middle Earth has come!

nodes.name: Win
nodes.banner: You won! The Ring was destroyed and the Middle Earth was saved!

nodes.name: Mount Doom
nodes.banner: Gollum, a wretched creature sees you:
nodes.question: Baggins! You have isfinally come! But the Precious will never be yours!

answers.answer: The One Ring must be destroyed in the fires of Mount Doom!
No, it's MY PRECIOUS now!
